## ðŸ“Š Data Analysis with Python

**Description:**  
A project where I cleaned, analyzed, and visualized a dataset using `pandas`, `matplotlib`, and `seaborn`.

**Skills Used:**
- Python
- Data Cleaning
- Data Visualization

**Preview:**
```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Sample Data
data = {'Year': [2021, 2022, 2023], 'Users': [120, 340, 560]}
df = pd.DataFrame(data)

# Plot
plt.plot(df['Year'], df['Users'], marker='o')
plt.title('Growth in Users Over Time')
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.ylabel('Users')
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
